code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import classes from'./ProductCardMain.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCardMain=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{brand,images,silhouette,color,vendorCode}=product;const link="/product/".concat(vendorCode.toLowerCase());const navigate=useNavigate();const formatBrand=brand=>{const words=brand.split(/\s*,\s*/);if(words.length>1){return words.join(' X ');}return brand;};const redirectToProductPage=()=>{navigate(link);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.product__card,onClick:redirectToProductPage,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[0],alt:formatBrand(brand)+" "+silhouette+" "+color}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:formatBrand(brand)+" "+silhouette+" "+color})]});};export default ProductCardMain;
